alert.note: Alert for St. Clair; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 2:59PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Talladega and south central St. Clair Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 258 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Vandiver to near Logan Martin Dam to Vincent. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Talladega, Pell City, Lincoln, Vincent, Harpersville, Alpine Bay Resort, Logan Martin Lake, Coosa Island, Logan Martin Dam, Alpine, Country Club Estates, St. Clair County Airport, Jackson Shoals, Cropwell and Howells Cove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
